tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE StockPricePrediction (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    opening_price DECIMAL,
    closing_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE stock_data (
  stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_name VARCHAR(50),
  market_cap DECIMAL,
  historical_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE technical_indicators (
  stock_id INT,
  date DATE,
  rsi DECIMAL,
  macd DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE stock_forecast (
  forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_id INT,
  forecast_date DATE,
  forecast_price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE HistoricalStockData (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(50),
    date TIMESTAMP,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE StockIndicators (
    indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id INT,
    indicator_type VARCHAR(50),
    value DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ModelTrainingData (
    training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    stock_id INT,
    training_date TIMESTAMP,
    training_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE StockPrices (
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialIndicators (
    date DATE,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    net_income DECIMAL,
    eps DECIMAL,
    roe DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE MarketSentiment (
    date DATE,
    news_sentiment DECIMAL,
    social_media_sentiment DECIMAL,
    analyst_sentiment DECIMAL,
    overall_sentiment DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE StockAnalysts (
    analyst_id INT,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(50),
    analyst_coverage TEXT,
    accuracy_score DECIMAL,
    recommendation_rating VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketData (
    date DATE,
    volume DECIMAL,
    volatility DECIMAL,
    market_cap DECIMAL,
    sector VARCHAR(50)
);
